attribute.name: preserveDataModel
attribute.description:
Indicates whether the state of the whole DataModel should be saved and restored. When set to false, the value-binding for the "value" attribute of this table is executed each time the page is rendered. When set to true, that value-binding is only executed when the component is first created, and the DataModel state is thereafter saved/restored automatically by the component.
When column sorting is used for a table this property needs to be false so that the DataModel can be updated to reflect any changes in the sort criteria.
Default: false

attribute.name: preserveRowStates
attribute.description:
Indicates whether the state for each row should not be discarded before the datatable is rendered again. Setting this to true might be hepful if an input component inside the datatable has no valuebinding and the value entered in there should be displayed again. This will only work reliable if the datamodel of the datatable did not change either by sorting, removing or adding rows.
Default: false

attribute.name: forceIdIndexFormula
attribute.description: A formula that overrides the default row index in the construction of table's body components. Example : #{myRowVar.key} Warning, the EL should evaluate to a unique value for each row !

attribute.name: sortColumn
attribute.description: Value reference to a model property that gives the current sort column name. The target String property is set to the "columnName" of whichever column has been chosen to sort by, and the method which is bound to the "value" attribute of this table (ie which provides the DataModel used) is expected to use this property to determine how to sort the DataModel's contents.

attribute.name: sortAscending
attribute.description: Value reference to a model property that gives the current sort direction. The target Boolean property is set to true when the selected sortColumn should be sorted in ascending order, and false otherwise. The method which is bound to the "value" attribute of this table (ie which provides the DataModel used) is expected to use this property to determine how to sort the DataModel's contents.

attribute.name: preserveSort
attribute.description: Indicates whether the state of the sortColumn and sortAscending attribute should be saved and restored and written back to the model during the update model phase. Default: true

attribute.name: renderedIfEmpty
attribute.description: Indicates whether this table should be rendered if the underlying DataModel is empty. You could as well use rendered="#{not empty bean.list}", but this one causes the getList method of your model bean beeing called up to five times per request, which is not optimal when the list is backed by a DB table. Using renderedIfEmpty="false" solves this problem, because the MyFaces extended HtmlDataTable automatically caches the DataModel and calles the model getter only once per request. Default: true

attribute.name: rowIndexVar
attribute.description: A parameter name, under which the current rowIndex is set in request scope similar to the var parameter.

attribute.name: rowCountVar
attribute.description: A parameter name, under which the rowCount is set in request scope similar to the var parameter.

attribute.name: previousRowDataVar
attribute.description: A parameter name, under which the previous RowData Object is set in request scope similar to the rowIndexVar and rowCountVar parameters. Mind that the value of this request scope attribute is null in the first row or when isRowAvailable returns false for the previous row.

attribute.name: rowOnClick
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onclick event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnDblClick
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript ondblclick event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnMouseDown
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onmpusedown event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnMouseUp
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onmouseup event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnMouseOver
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onmouseover event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnMouseMove
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onmousemove event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnMouseOut
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onmouseout event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnKeyPress
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onkeypress event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnKeyDown
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onkeydown event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowOnKeyUp
attribute.description: Defines a JavaScript onkeyup event handler for each table row

attribute.name: rowId
attribute.description: The id to use for <tr> elements that are generated by the table.

attribute.name: rowStyleClass
attribute.description: Corresponds to the HTML class attribute for the row tr tag.

attribute.name: rowStyle
attribute.description: Corresponds to the HTML style attribute for the row tr tag.
